definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: redeem, act as kinsman (NH, Niph. be redeemed; also [[גּוֹאֵל]], [[גְּאוּלָּה]])—
act as kinsman, do the part of next of kin (chiefly in D H P Ru), [[גּׁאֵל]] kinsman Le 25:25 (H) Nu 5:8, Nu 35:12 (P) Ru 2:20, Ru 3:9, Ru 3:12, Ru 4:1, Ru 4:3, Ru 4:6, Ru 4:8, Ru 4:14, 1Ki 16:11.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in taking a kinsman's widow [[אם יגאלך טוב יגאל ואם לא יחפץ לגאלך]] [[וגאלתיך]] if he will do thee the kinsman's part (raise up children by the widow) well, let him do the kinsman's part; but if he is not pleased to do thee the kinsman's part then I will do thee the kinsman's part Ru 3:13;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in redeeming from bondage Le 25:48, Le 25:49 (H);

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in redeeming a field Le 25:26, Le 25:33 (H) Ru 4:4, Ru 4:6;

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: claim as kinsman Job 3:5;

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[גּׁאֵל הַדָּם]] the avenger of blood Nu 35:19, Nu 35:21, Nu 35:24, Nu 35:25, Nu 35:27, Nu 35:27, Jos 20:3, Jos 20:5 (?; not in LXX) v:Jos 20:9 (P). De 19:6, De 19:12 (D) 2Sa 14:11.
redeem, by payment of value assessed, of consecrated things, by the original owner Le 27:13, Le 27:15, Le 27:19, Le 27:20, Le 27:31 (P).
redeem, with God as subj. implying personal relationship, chiefly in poetry:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: individuals, from death Ps 103:4, La 3:58, Ho 13:14, [[מכל רע]] Ge 48:16 (E poetry), [[נפשׁ]] Ps 69:19, Ps 72:14, orphans Pr 23:11, Je 50:34, [[ריבה ריבי וגאלני]] Ps 119:154, [[גּׁאֲלִי]] Job 19:25, [[חוּרִי וְגׁאֲלִי]] Ps 19:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Israel, from Egyptian bondage Ex 6:6 (P?) Ex 15:13 (song) Ps 74:2, Ps 77:16, Ps 78:35, [[מיד אויב]] Ps 106:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: from exile (chiefly Is:Is 3, the vb. not in Is:Is 1) Is 43:1, Is 44:22, Is 44:23, Is 48:20, Is 52:9, Is 63:9, Mic 4:10, [[מיד]] Ps 107:2, Je 31:11; Yahweh is [[גּׁאֵל]] Is 41:14, Is 43:14, Is 44:6, Is 44:24, Is 47:4, Is 48:17, Is 49:7, Is 49:26, Is 54:5, Is 54:8, Is 59:20, Is 60:16, Is 63:16; and the people [[גְּאוּלִים]] Is 35:9, Is 51:10, Is 62:12, Is 63:4 (cf. [[גְּאוּלַי]] infr.), Ps 107:2.
refl. redeem oneself Le 25:49 (H).
pass. be redeemed,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: field Le 25:30 (H), slave Le 25:54 (H);

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: consecrated things Le 27:20, Le 27:27, Le 27:28, Le 27:33 (P);

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Jerusalem by Yahweh Is 52:3.
